definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Fold proper air cap with bubble facing outer into the bottom of the box.
sentences.chinese: 對疊好適量的氣泡墊放入箱底，氣泡麪朝外。

sentences.english: ADD salt and tomato paste halfway through the cooking, or later.
sentences.chinese: 在烹飪過程加適量的鹽或番茄醬或者稍後加。

sentences.english: Add to that the costs associated with a moderate involvement with those newly prioritized activities that you truly love.
sentences.chinese: 然後加上適量參加重新排選過你所熱愛的活動的費用。

sentences.english: "Of course, as with everything, we encourage moderation, " lead FDA researcher Phillip Millar said.
sentences.chinese: 當然，和其他東西一樣，我們鼓勵適量。

sentences.english: A certain amount of dreaming is good, like a narcotic in discreet doses.
sentences.chinese: 一定程度的夢想，正如適量的鎮靜劑，是好的。

sentences.english: Supply 1 tsp chilli flake, season with salt and pepper. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加1勺辣椒粉，適量鹽和胡椒，拌勻。

sentences.english: Almonds contain lots of oxalates and should be eaten only in moderation.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁含有大量草酸，應該適量食用。

sentences.english: Suitable content of gypsum will be helpful to improve the strength of the soft soil solidified by the cement.
sentences.chinese: 適量的石膏摻入也有利於窯灰水泥固化土強度的提高。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice, strain over ice and top with Champagne.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量香檳。

sentences.english: Appropriate amount of rim chlorite also played an active role in the protection of reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 適量的環邊綠泥石也對儲層起到了一定的保護作用。

sentences.english: Better a little fire to warm us, than a at one to burn us.
sentences.chinese: 適量的火好取暖，熊熊烈火能焚身。

sentences.english: Stir first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass, then top up with Champagne and lightly stir.
sentences.chinese: 前三項加冰攪合，濾入杯子，倒適量香檳後輕輕攪拌。

sentences.english: The doctor thinks right amount take vitaminic E to be able to resist effectively anile .
sentences.chinese: 醫生認爲適量服用維他命E能有效抵禦衰老。

sentences.english: Sprinkle some oregano all over the beef.
sentences.chinese: 把適量的牛至葉均勻撒在牛肉上。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice , strain over fresh ice and top with soda water.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合所有原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量蘇打水。

sentences.english: Cut the jelly into small cubes; add in the desiccated coconut and serve.
sentences.chinese: 冷凍至凝固後取出切粒，加入適量椰蓉即成。

definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
